Posts.Content: Sep 30, 2009 05:14AM DeltaGirl wrote: I have been reading this discussion ever since Heidi first started it.  I read and am absolutely speechless, but feel good that all of you have the right words to comfort Heidi and her family at this time. I am still praying, but my heart aches for Heidi's kids and husband. I am keeping watch. I am part of Heidi's vigil.
Posts.Title: Heidi Update-it isn't pretty Heidi_Ho zeeka71
